links.name: ADDitude
links.comment:
This
is a wonderful free online resource for information, experiences, understanding
and advice from a variety of viewpoints including adult ADHD'ers, parents of
ADHD kids, physicians, and researchers.

links.name: The Dyslexic Advantage
links.desc:
Unlocking the Hidden Potential of
the Dyslexic Brain
links.comment:
I almost didn't read(listen to) this book after having read the
"The ADHD Advantage" and being throughly disappointed in it. While the "The
ADHD Advantage" seems to be more of a cheerleading book, "The Dyslexic
Advantage" provides interesting insight into a dyslexic brain's cognition.

links.name: The Power of Different
links.desc:
The link between disorder and
genius

links.name: Braving the Wilderness
links.desc:
The Quest for True
Belonging and the Courage to Stand Alone
links.comment:
Not specifically ADHD or Dyslexia related; useful in the search for
belonging many of us seek.

links.name: Dyslexia for a Day
links.comment: These were interesting to stumble across in a somewhat funny and painful way. My personal belief is that every primary/grade school teacher should experience these simulations.
